name: Orbiter (itch) (TacticalBanana)
description:
NB:

The health bar at the top indicates how many asteroids you let get past you and damage done to it varies on the size of the asteroid

Story:

Tons of asteroids are rushing towards your solar system!

With the help of your moons you must destroy them before they demolish every planet!

collect your moons and use them to smash the asteroids apart!!

Instructions:

This is an endless side scroller where the aim is to stop as many asteroids as possible

Pick up the silver moons and use them to destroy the fiery asteroids 

Controls:

WASD or the arrow keys to move
